<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dust Mephit](/Monsters.aspx?ID=659)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Whining and self-important creatures, dust mephits are known for their tendency to pronounce doom and gloom at every opportunity, lamenting every insignificant and minor difficulty as though it were an insurmountable obstacle and making themselves out to be heroes for struggling valiantly against their cruel fates. They tend to be thin and gaunt, with dusky brown and gray skin and wings.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 17

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ElementalMephit_DustMephit.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Dust Mephit](/Monsters.aspx?ID=659)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +3; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 16
([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 2 (in dust or sand))

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 slashing

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 17
- **2nd**
[Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55)) The dust mephit breathes a cloud of dust in a 15-foot cone that deals 2d6 slashing damage to each creature within the area (DC 17 basic Reflex save). The dust mephit can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
